languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Даргонус молит о помощи. В нескольких ульях мира вспыхнули волнения, связанные с трактовкой священных писаний. Выявляя агентуру Последнего восхода, Экклезиархия с особым тщанием принялась бороться с малыми культами и насаждать верный образ следования Кредо. Чернь ропщет против притеснений, которым подверглись церкви-минориты, и смеет утверждать, что святые пастыри присвоили себе право говорить за Бога-Императора".

"Dargonus is crying out for aid, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy clamped down on the planet's minor cults, attempting to force correct adherence to the Creed upon the populace. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Даргонус молит о помощи. В нескольких ульях мира вспыхнули волнения, связанные с трактовкой священных писаний. Выявляя агентуру Последнего восхода, Экклезиархия с особым тщанием принялась бороться с малыми культами и насаждать верный образ следования Кредо. traits.locale_text: "Dargonus is crying for help, Lord Captain. The riots over the interpretation of the scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy had started to fight the minor cults and trying to make them follow the right way of following the Creed. The commoners are murmuring against the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy pastors have assumed the right to speak for the God-Emperor completely for themselves."

"Dargonus is crying for help, Lord Captain. The riots over the interpretation of the scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy had started to fight the minor cults and trying to make them follow the right way of following the Creed. The commoners are murmuring against the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy pastors have assumed the right to speak for the God-Emperor completely for themselves."

"Dargonus cries for help, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy began reining in the minor cults, attempting to force upon them the correct adherence to the Creed. The commoners whisper of oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy pastors have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy clamped down on the planet's minor cults, attempting to force correct adherence to the Creed upon the populace. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

languages.text: “达戈努斯在呼叫支援，舰长大人。首都世界各地的多个巢都爆发了关于圣典解读的骚乱。国教成员在追捕终末黎明邪教的特工时，也开始钳制这颗行星上的所有小型教派，试图强迫所有人遵守所谓正确的信条。那些国教牧师不仅压迫小型教派，甚至断然声称国教才是神皇唯一钦定的代言人，众多平民对此颇有怨言。”
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is crying out for aid, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy clamped down on the planet's minor cults, attempting to force correct adherence to the Creed upon the populace. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “达戈努斯在呼叫支援，舰长大人。首都世界各地的多个巢都爆发了关于圣典解读的骚乱。国教成员在追捕终末黎明邪教的特工时，也开始钳制这颗行星上的所有小型教派，试图强迫所有人遵守所谓正确的信条。那些国教牧师不仅压迫小型教派，甚至断然声称国教才是神皇唯一钦定的代言人，众多平民对此颇有怨言。”

languages.text: «Dargonus pide socorro, Lord Capitán. Han estallado disturbios por la interpretación de las escrituras en varias colmenas de todo el mundo. Mientras perseguía a los agentes del Culto del Amanecer Final, la Eclesiarquía comenzó a ejercer presión sobre los cultos menores del planeta, intentando imponer una correcta adhesión al Credo a la población. Los plebeyos protestan por la opresión de los cultos menores, e incluso se atreven a afirmar que los santos eclesiarcas se han arrogado el derecho exclusivo de hablar en nombre del Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is crying out for aid, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy clamped down on the planet's minor cults, attempting to force correct adherence to the Creed upon the populace. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Dargonus pide socorro, Lord Capitán. Han estallado disturbios por la interpretación de las escrituras en varias colmenas de todo el mundo. Mientras perseguía a los agentes del Culto del Amanecer Final, la Eclesiarquía comenzó a ejercer presión sobre los cultos menores del planeta, intentando imponer una correcta adhesión al Credo a la población. Los plebeyos protestan por la opresión de los cultos menores, e incluso se atreven a afirmar que los santos eclesiarcas se han arrogado el derecho exclusivo de hablar en nombre del Dios Emperador».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスは助けを求めている。聖典の解釈をめぐる暴動が、惑星中のいくつかのハイヴで勃発している。最後の夜明け魔女団の諜報員を捜索している間に、帝国聖教会は少数派の魔女団を支配し始め、彼らに信条への忠誠を強要しようとした。庶民たちは、少数派の魔女団に対する弾圧をささやき、聖なる司祭たちが神帝陛下の代弁者としての権利を独り占めしていると主張するようにまでなっている」
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is crying out for aid, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy clamped down on the planet's minor cults, attempting to force correct adherence to the Creed upon the populace. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスは助けを求めている。聖典の解釈をめぐる暴動が、惑星中のいくつかのハイヴで勃発している。最後の夜明け魔女団の諜報員を捜索している間に、帝国聖教会は少数派の魔女団を支配し始め、彼らに信条への忠誠を強要しようとした。庶民たちは、少数派の魔女団に対する弾圧をささやき、聖なる司祭たちが神帝陛下の代弁者としての権利を独り占めしていると主張するようにまでなっている」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, Dargonus nous appelle à l'aide ! Des émeutes ont éclaté dans plusieurs ruches du monde, suite à l'interprétation des écritures. Tout en pourchassant les agents du Culte de l'Aube finale, l'Ecclésiarchie a resserré son emprise sur les cultes mineurs de la planète, dans l'espoir d'inculquer le respect du Crédo à la plèbe. Le petit peuple se grommelle et se plaint de l'oppression de cultes mineurs et va même jusqu'à prétendre que les saints ecclésiarques s'octroient à eux seuls le droit de parler au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu. »
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is crying out for aid, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy clamped down on the planet's minor cults, attempting to force correct adherence to the Creed upon the populace. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, Dargonus nous appelle à l'aide ! Des émeutes ont éclaté dans plusieurs ruches du monde, suite à l'interprétation des écritures. Tout en pourchassant les agents du Culte de l'Aube finale, l'Ecclésiarchie a resserré son emprise sur les cultes mineurs de la planète, dans l'espoir d'inculquer le respect du Crédo à la plèbe. Le petit peuple se grommelle et se plaint de l'oppression de cultes mineurs et va même jusqu'à prétendre que les saints ecclésiarques s'octroient à eux seuls le droit de parler au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu. »

languages.text: "Dargonus schreit um Hilfe, Lord Captain. Es gab in verschiedenen Makropolen auf der gesamten Welt gewalttätige Auseinandersetzung wegen der Deutung der heiligen Schriften. Während ihrer Jagd auf die Agenten des Kults der letzten Dämmerung hat die Ekklesiarchie auch die niederen Kulte unterdrückt und versucht, die Bevölkerung zur Einhaltung des imperialen Glaubens zu zwingen. Das gemeine Volk beklagt diese tyrannische Unterdrückung der niederen Kulte und sagt, die heiligen Ekklesiarchen würden das alleinige Recht für sich beanspruchen, für den Gottimperator zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is crying out for aid, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy clamped down on the planet's minor cults, attempting to force correct adherence to the Creed upon the populace. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

Während ihrer Jagd auf die Agenten des Kults der letzten Dämmerung hat die Ekklesiarchie auch die niederen Kulte unterdrückt und versucht, die Bevölkerung zur Einhaltung des imperialen Glaubens zu zwingen. Das gemeine Volk beklagt diese tyrannische Unterdrückung der niederen Kulte und sagt, die heiligen Ekklesiarchen würden das alleinige Recht für sich beanspruchen, für den Gottimperator zu sprechen."

languages.text: "Dargonus'tan yardım çığlıkları yükseliyor Lord Kaptan. Dünya üzerindeki birçok kovanda yazıtların yorumlanması üzerine isyanlar patlak vermiş. Ekleşiarşi, bir yandan Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın ajanlarını avlarken ufak çaplı tarikatlara da aman vermemeye başlamış. Halkı İtikat'a hakiki bir şekilde sadakat göstermeye zorlamaya çalışıyorlar. Sıradan yurttaşların homurtularında ufak çaplı tarikatların baskıları duyuluyor. Hatta kutsal ekleşiarkların Tanrı İmparator adına konuşma haklarını üstlendiklerini iddia edecek kadar cüretkârlar."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is crying out for aid, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."
